title: HTML5 Video Element And Live Streaming
body:
We use Microsoft Expression Encoder to do live, smooth streaming, video feeds.
I was surprised to find that the, built-in, media player doesn't support the HTML5 video element and live streaming.

comments.body: +3 For reference, I have reported a similar issue for lack of media format support: http://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/110705-dev-platform/suggestions/4480926-asf-container-for-live-streaming
